about_the_game:
Installation:

After installed, the DLC will be downloaded in your local folder.
Check the game library, right click "The Other: Rosie's Road of Love", click "properties" and find the "local files".

☆ ☆ ☆
This Art Book includes everything about "Rosie's Road of Love" and its development.
It is an A4 sized ebook (a pdf file) with over 130 pages (70 double pages). In this art book you will find:

◇ Detailed information about the characters, environments and the whole story
◇ Collectables and CGs
◇ Doodles and sketches during the development
◇ New illustrations
◇ Comments from the developer


Thank you for supporting this project!
